channel.title: Keep items
channel.description: I'd like to give pvp armour ONLY to staff. I don't want it out to the public. If they die in it, that would cause a problem. How can i make pvp armour Auto-keep? no matter what

item.title: Keep items
item.dc:creator: @akman15324 akman15324
item.description:
@akman15324 wrote:

Errm. I dont exactly want mods to keep everything, and they’re getting pvp arm :S

Read full topic

item.title: Keep items
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Just make it that Admins+ Keeps all items on death

You can try that, just change it around a bit

public void valueitem() { if(isSkulled && !ProtItem) { sM("You are skulled and protect prayer is OFF! You will keep -"); if(playerHasItem(6570)) sM("Fire Cape"); resetKeepItem(); return; } if(isSkulled && ProtItem){ keepItem1(); sM("You are skulled and protect prayer is ON! You will keep -"+ getItemName(itemKept1)); if(playerHasItem(6570)) sM("Fire Cape"); resetKeepItem(); return; } keepItem1(); keepItem2(); keepItem3(); keepItem4(); if(!ProtItem) sM("You are not skulled and protect prayer is OFF! You will keep -"); if(ProtItem) sM("You are not skulled and protect prayer is ON! You will keep -"); sM(getItemName(itemKept1)); sM(getItemName(itemKept2)); sM(getItemName(itemKept3)); if(ProtItem) sM(getItemName(itemKept4)); if(playerHasItem(6570)) sM("Fire Cape"); resetKeepItem(); }

Read full topic
